title: Encryption at rest for engine storage
description: Protect and safeguard your data to meet your organizational security and compliance commitments
details: Provides volume encryption for the OS and data disks of your cluster virtual machines. It also integrates with Azure Key Vault, which allows us to control and manage the disk encryption keys and secrets, and ensure all data on the VM disks is encrypted

documentation.title: Enable encryption at rest in the Azure portal

title: Encryption at rest for the underlying storage accounts
description: Encrypts all data in a storage account at rest
details: Azure Data Explorer encrypts all data in a storage account at rest. By default, data is encrypted with Microsoft-managed keys. For additional control over encryption keys, you can supply customer-managed keys to use for data encryption

documentation.title: Configure customer-managed keys using the Azure portal
Use customer managed keys to encrypt data on Azure Data Explorer clusters
